entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or ice pellets. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle late this evening. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 07:36 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
